
## {{dist}}

```{r}
#| label: "fig-data-{{dist}}"
#| include: true
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 6
#| out-width: "65%"
#| fig-cap: "Plot for {{dist}} distribution"

my_data <- all_data |>
    filter(dist == "{{dist}}") |>
    pluck("data", 1)

my_data |>
    ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y )) +
      geom_point()

```
